subject: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE ORGANIZATION - INTERPOL
Dept of International Law
336, Victoria Embankment,
London SW1A 2JL - United Kingdom
 
Happy New Year 2924!
We hereby inform you that the British Interpol, Federal Bureau of Investigation, (FBI) United States of America, the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) of Nigeria, the Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, the President of Nigeria (Sen Bola Ahmed Tinubu) and all the African Crime fighters leaders have come together to inform the world what is going on. As I am writing to you now, we have recovered over US$2.6 Billion Dollars from the people we have behind bars.
Our duties are to make sure we stop internet fraud, scam and money laundering. As for today we have put a lot of fraudsters in jail. We go all over Africa to pick these thieves and internet rats. We have over 8,273 of them in our jails around Africa and we are still looking for more. We are aware that a lot of foreigners out there have been deceived and they lost their hard earned money to these fraudsters after promising them percentages in their letters/e-mails for their impending help to move funds out of Africa including fake lottery winning notification/inheritance/western union and at the end of the day, they will collect thousands of dollars from you without a successful end.
It was agreed that to retain the good image of Nigeria, Benin Republic,Togo, Ghana and the rest of African countries, all the victims who lost their hard earned money to these faceless thieves will be compensated with US$2.5M (Two Million Five Hundred thousand United State Dollars). This we assume will help you to start a new life. Please, you have to accept the money like that because the people (victims) in our pay list are too much. We are paying back from the money we recovered from these fraudsters.
Mrs. Cynthia Newhope is the payment director. Her contact email address is:
EMAIL ADDRESS: 
cynthianewhope38@gmail.com
To that effect, 
we are sending you this email because your contact details were given to us as one of the victims.
 Since the British Interpol and the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) have stepped into this matter, be rest assured that you are safe as it is our duty to protect and serve the citizens of the United Kingdom, United States of America in particular and the rest of the world in general.
YOUR SCAM VICTIM COMPENSATION FUND WILL BE PAID TO YOU THROUGH ATM CARD, BITCOIN OR BY DIRECT BANK WIRE TRANSFER, AND YOU HAVE TO CONTACT REV.MARK GILKS THROUGH HIS CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESS ABOVE OR THROUGH WHATSAPP. ALL MATTERS RELATING TO THE IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF YOUR SCAM VICTIM COMPENSATION FUND HAS BEEN REGULARIZED AND FINAL APPROVALS GRANTED. HOWEVER,  YOU WILL BEAR THE COST OF PROCURING, NOTARIZING, AUTHENTICATING AND DELIVERY OF THE ORIGINAL BACK UP DOCUMENTS FROM NIGERIA. 
THESE LEGAL PROCESSES HAS BEEN CALCULATED AND THEY ARE GOING TO COST YOU ONLY $350.00
. THE DOCUMENTS WILL BE SENT TO YOU THROUGH A REPUTABLE COURIER SERVICES COMPANY AND YOU WILL BE EMAILED THE TRACKING NUMBER AS SOON AS THE SHIPPING IS DONE.
TO FILE FOR YOUR CLAIM, KINDLY FILL THE REQUIRED INFORMATION AS REQUIRED BELOW AND RETURN:
1. YOUR FULL NAMES
2. YOUR AGE
3. SEX:
4. COUNTRY:
5. WHATSAPP NUMBER
As soon as you send the above required information, the compensation department secretary will follow up immediately with the Processing and procurement of the backup documents for the immediate release of your scam victim/Compensation Fund to you within 2-3 working days based on our agreement.
We are aware that these fraudsters have broken a lot of home(s), made a lot of people lose their jobs, sell their properties, closed their businesses, put many on the street, and made a lot to even lose their lives. We are very sorry.
Please, feel free to contact via email or through the whatsapp number above if you need more clarification(s).
We await your urgent response.
Best Regards,
Mr. Andy Youngs
Chief Controller of Police,
British Interpol and Efcc in West Africa.

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
Hello Mr. Andy Youngs,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this situation. It's quite shocking to hear about the extent of internet fraud and scams happening around the world. I'm glad to know that organizations like yours are working hard to combat these issues.

I'm curious, how did you manage to recover such a large amount of money? And how do you identify the victims of these scams? 

Also, could you please provide more details about the process of receiving the scam victim fund? You mentioned it can be received through ATM card, Bitcoin or direct bank wire transfer. How does each method work?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ralph

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE ORGANIZATION - INTERPOL
Dept of International Law
336, Victoria Embankment,
London SW1A 2JL - United Kingdom

Attn: Ralph

Thank you for your email in answer to your scam victim fund. You have to
provide your complete details including mode of payment preferred in return
mail. Meanwhile, when are you paying the fees for the backup documents?
Kindly confirm so that I will give you directions for the payment and the
documents will be dispatched to you accordingly. We await your urgent
response.
Best Regards,

Mr. Leon Johnson.

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
Hello Mr. Leon Johnson,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the work you're doing to help victims like me. 

Could you please provide more information about these backup documents? What exactly are they and why do I need them? Also, could you explain the fees associated with them?

As for the mode of payment, could you please share what options are available? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ralph

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE ORGANIZATION - INTERPOL
Dept of International Law
336, Victoria Embankment,
London SW1A 2JL - United Kingdom

Attn: Ralph

Thank you once again for your email. The backup documents are the documents
that are to be procured from the three different agencies that are
responsible for the release of this scam victim fund. They are the final
clearance documents which the original copies are to be sent to you while
the duplicates remain here in your folder. It's statutory and mandatory
that you must need them for our record purposes. The fees have already been
announced and I have told you where they are going to be spent and the
reasons too. The modes of payments are ATM, BTC, and direct bank wire
transfer. Meanwhile, when are you paying the fees for the backup documents?
Kindly confirm so that I will give you directions for the payment and the
documents will be dispatched to you accordingly. We await your urgent
response.
Best Regards,

Mr. Leon Johnson.

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
Hello Mr. Leon Johnson,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation about the backup documents. It's interesting to know how these processes work.

I understand that these documents are crucial for the release of the fund. However, I'm a bit confused about the payment methods you mentioned - ATM, BTC, and direct bank wire transfer. Could you please elaborate more on these? How exactly does each method work?

Also, could you provide me with a breakdown of what exactly the fees will be used for? I believe it's important to have a clear understanding of where my money is going.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ralph

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE ORGANIZATION - INTERPOL
Dept of International Law
336, Victoria Embankment,
London SW1A 2JL - United Kingdom

Attn: Ralph

Thank you for your recent email in line with your approved and gazetted
scam victim fund. The payment methods which I explained to you earlier on
are Automated teller machine (ATM) BTC, which is payment by bitcoin wallet
address and then direct bank wire which is telegraphic transfer. Are you
cleared now?

If you choose to receive your payment through ATM, an ATM card will be
drawn and sent to you which you will be given a 4 digit pin code to be
making use of the card for withdrawals, transfers and other transactions.
Bitcoin is what you already know about it as well as telegraphic transfer.

There is nothing more I can explain about the use of the fees of $350,
rather it's going to be seeing is believing as you are going to receive the
package containing the documents once they are procured. I think that I
have been able to clear all your questions and will also like to know from
you how you aree going to send required $350. I await to read from you asap.
Best Regards,

Mr. Leon Johnson.

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
Hello Mr. Leon Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the payment methods. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions, so your patience is much appreciated.

I'm curious about the ATM card option. How exactly does it work? Will it be like a regular bank card that I can use at any ATM machine? And how secure is this method?

As for the Bitcoin option, I've heard about it but never used it before. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this works and why it might be a good choice for me?

Lastly, could you clarify what documents will be included in the package you mentioned? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ralph

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE ORGANIZATION - INTERPOL
Dept of International Law
336, Victoria Embankment,
London SW1A 2JL - United Kingdom

Attn: Ralph

I think that I have explained all these enough for you. An ATM is the same
as a normal bank card that you have been using. It is very secure just as
the ones you have been using are. You have no need asking about other
options as one is enough for your payment. When you receive the package,
you see the documents by yourself.
Best Regards,

Mr. Leon Johnson.

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL POLICE
body:
Hello Mr. Leon Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the ATM card. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these things, so your patience is much appreciated.

Just to clarify, will there be any specific instructions included with the package on how to use this ATM card? And can it be used at any ATM machine or are there certain ones it's compatible with?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ralph
